traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The mammoth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mammoth makes two attacks: one with its gore and one with its slam.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
